about_the_game:
Ahoy, matey! Get ready to weigh anchor as we cast off for Waven’s Early Access!

Start sailing the high seas with the Deluxe Founder’s Pack which contains bonuses worthy of your pioneering status. Stand out with this unique cosmetic elements exclusively available during the Early Access!



This Founder’s Pack contains:
  • 5,000x Gems*
  • 1x Symbiote pet
  • 4x combat visual effects
  • 4x world visual effects
This Founder Pack also contains all the cosmetic items from the Standard Founder’s Pack:
  • 4x Broken Sword emotes
  • 1x Throne trophy

*Gems are an in-game currency that allows you to unlock cosmetic elements in Waven. Use them to unlock skins for your hero, your island or your boat, but also visual effects, emotes or speech bubbles to customize your adventure on the high seas.
